# CVReadOnlyPixelBuffer

**Class**

CVReadOnlyPixelBuffer provides an immutable view of the pixel data held by the pixel buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
final class CVReadOnlyPixelBuffer
```

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Initialize a read-only pixel buffer by consuming a mutable pixel buffer value.
- **init(unsafeBuffer:)**: Initialize a read-only pixel buffer by transferring existing CVPixelBuffer value.
